fullplot: Bartertown is a city on the edge of a desert that has managed to retain some technology if no civilization. Max has his supplies stolen and must seek shelter there in a post apocalyptic world where all machines have begun to break down and barbarians hold what is left. He becomes involved in a power struggle in this third Mad Max film where he must first survive the town, survive the desert and then rescue the innocent children he has discovered.
plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Austrailia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.
title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
